name: BroccoMeat: FoodFight!
description: In a world tainted by conflict the population is divided, the government and the scientific community can’t settle the argument between carnivores and vegans for which diet is the better one. People of different dietary cultures battle each other to decide the fate of the supreme diet that will save the world. Play online with 2 or 4 players! Throw as much food at the enemy’s side of the field as you can and clean yours! When time runs out whoever has the cleanest side wins!
